sentences.en: " Huck, Muff Potter don't know it. How can he tell? "
sentences.cn: “ 哈克, 莫夫-波特不知道出事了,他怎么能告发 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: " If anybody tells, let Muff Potter do it, if he's fool enough.
sentences.cn: “ 要揭发就让莫夫-波特那个傻瓜去干吧!

sentences.en: " It was within three feet of Muff Potter when it done it. "
sentences.cn: “ 当时,莫夫-波特离死人不到三英尺远呢. ”

sentences.en: Don't muff your chance to earn a promotion.
He made a muff of himself.
He made a muff of the business.
Hela first , then Manya threw down muff and satchel and began excitedly choosing their own apples.
sentences.cn: 先是海拉,接着是玛尼娅,都脱掉手套,放下书包, 高兴地挑选起自己要的苹果来.

sentences.en: Now all were kind to Muff Potter , forgetting that they had not been kind before.
sentences.cn: 现在,所有的人都开始和穆夫·波特亲近, 而忘记了自己曾对他不太友善.

sentences.en: Oh, it's colder, I left my muff at home.
sentences.cn: 噢, 天气冷起来了, 我把保暖套忘在家里了.

sentences.en: One of'em's old Muff Potter's voice. "
sentences.cn: 那是莫夫-波特 老头 的声音.

sentences.en: She'd take Aunt Pitty's little seal muff and hide her bare hands in it.
sentences.cn: 她想用皮蒂姑妈那个海豹皮手筒,好将自己的手戴在里面.

sentences.en: She's a goner, just as dead sure as Muff Potter's a goner.
sentences.cn: 和莫夫-波特一样,她就要完了,这是那些黑鬼说的.

sentences.en: So it's the same with Muff Potter, of course.
sentences.cn: 所以莫夫-波特当然也不例外喽.

sentences.en: The summer winds down , and it is time for the trial of Muff Potter.
sentences.cn: 夏日将尽, 审判穆夫.波特的时候到了.

sentences.en: Their press manager Muff had an assistant called Duff.
sentences.cn: 她们的新闻经理穆夫有一位名叫达夫的助手.

trans.tran_cn: 皮手笼, 保温的, 笨拙的人, 接球失败
皮手笼，笨拙的人，接球失败
